game.name: T.K. Punk - G.O.L.D
game.shortDescription: Cyber Three Kingdoms Turn-Based Strategy RPG— As the latest humanoid AI developed, you were kidnapped by Zhang Jiao and joined the resistance organization—GOLD. Develop yourself, accept commissions, research prosthetics, cultivate companions and pursue the love and destruction in your heart!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cyber Three Kingdoms Turn-Based Strategy RPG— As the latest humanoid AI developed, you were kidnapped by Zhang Jiao and joined the resistance organization—GOLD. Develop yourself, accept commissions, research prosthetics, cultivate companions and pursue the love and destruction in your heart!
